name: HDML File
summary: Learn about .HDM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HDML files commonly use the .HDML file extension.

description: An HDM file is a markup language webpage file that is created in the Handheld Device Markup Language (HDML). It contains markup tags similar to HTML language, but is designed for handheld electronic devices such as smartphones and PDAs. The HDML file format specifications were submitted to W3C for standardization but couldnâ€™t become a standard. HDM is based on the HDML file format specifications available at W3 website.

Web page written in the Handheld Device Markup Language (HDML); designed for portable electronic devices, such as smartphones and PDAs; HDML files are transferred to devices using HDTP (the Handheld Device Transport Protocol) rather than HTTP, which is used for .HTML pages.
